page.title: 07HOUSING TYPES
page.content: There are 223 houses in Newbold made up of 42 council houses and 181 private houses. {COUNCIL HOUSES. There are 20 council houses built in 1953 round Cloud Hill View, and there are 32 built in 1930 on Worthington Lane.The rent for a council house is Â£43.80p per month or if you have a garage it is 50p extra. {PRIVATE HOUSES In Newbold there are 181 private houses. Private houses are houses that members of the general public own. All houses or bungalows have a certain amount of ground to them. {TYPES OF BUILDINGS. In Newbold there are 221 living places 9 work places 3 social places
